title: RAG Resume API
summary: A Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system integrated into my personal website, allowing visitors to query my resume and personal documents. Built with LlamaIndex, FastAPI, Google Gemini, and deployed as a Dockerized API on Google Cloud Platform (Free Tier).
highlights: Integrated a live AI assistant on my personal website for interactive querying of resume and documents.
Implemented a RAG pipeline using LlamaIndex for indexing and Google GenAI for embeddings.
Used Google Gemini (gemini-2.5-flash) for context-aware answer generation.
Deployed the FastAPI backend on Google Cloud Run with Docker containerization.

title: Amazon Electronics Recommender System
summary: Built and deployed an end-to-end recommendation system on the Amazon Reviews 2023 Electronics dataset (â‰ˆ391k interactions, 41k users, 137k items). Implemented collaborative filtering, hybrid metadata+SBERT models and a two-tower MLP; used FAISS for retrieval and an MLP re-ranker for production-grade recommendations.
highlights: Improved NDCG@10 from 0.305 to 0.334 using a Two-Tower MLP with text features (multi-seed validation).
Increased cold-start hit rate by ~50% with SBERT text embeddings and hybrid features.
Two-stage serving pipeline (FAISS retrieval + MLP re-rank) achieving sub-100ms inference latency on CPU after warm start.
Deployed as a FastAPI REST API, containerized with Docker and hosted on Azure Container Apps (scale-to-zero).
note: Live demo may cold-start from scale-to-zero. The first request can take up to ~30s; subsequent requests respond quickly.

title: Transformer-Based Sentiment Analysis (YouTube Comments)
summary: End-to-end sentiment classification for YouTube comments using a fine-tuned BERT model, served via a Flask REST API and containerized with Docker. CI/CD pipeline automates Docker image builds and pushes to Docker Hub.
highlights: Achieved F1 = 0.81 on an imbalanced dataset of 10k+ comments.
Deployed an interactive Gradio demo on Hugging Face Spaces and an API endpoint for integrations.
Automated builds and publishing using GitHub Actions.

title: Glaucoma Detection from Retinal Fundus Images
summary: Detection of glaucoma using optic disc/cup segmentation and SVM classification. Presented at ICCSP 2020.
highlights: Led a 4-member team and published the work at ICCSP 2020.
Proposed a region-growing segmentation pipeline with SVM classification.
